alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 6:20PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Pennington County through 700 PM MDT... At 620 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles southeast of Mystic, or 5 miles north of Hill City, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hill City, Keystone, Silver City, Rockerville, Mount Rushmore National Memorial, Sheridan Lake, Keystone Wye, Horse Thief Lake, Palmer Gulch Resort and Pactola Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
